name: Blind Run (Krasno)
description:
Blind Run is a small runner type game for the BlindJam Game Jam where you run automatically, you just need to jump, crouch and attack, all being directed with sound clues. After the game has loaded you need to click on the game and press any key first for the game to start. Controls: (D) Crouch
(F) Jump
(J) Attack
